name: Maxvision Social Welfare Society

address: G-2, First Floor, Street No. 2, Ashok Vihar, Phase-1

briefDescription: We focus on Child Labor Education, slum kid education.Women and youth empowerment, placement linked skill development program, Health care, legal aid to poor Environment - plantation and awareness Number of beneficiaries - 300 Child labor, 450 slum kids and 120 women and youth per year are getting benefits from our different programs on regular basis.
